src_original: ime kho punarāyuṣmanto catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmā anvarddhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśamāgacchanti /
tgt_original: 是四波羅夷法，半月半月波羅提木叉中說。

src_original: PrMoSū(Mā)_Pār.1. yo punabhikṣu bhikṣuṇā śikṣā sāmīcīsamāpanno śikṣāmāpratyākhyāya  daurvvalyamanāviṣkṛtvā maithunaṃ grāmyadharmmaṃ pratiṣeveya antamaśato tiryagyonigatāyamapi  sārddhamayaṃ bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavatyasaṃvāsyo na labhate bhikṣu hi sārddha saṃvāsaṃ /
tgt_original: 「若比丘，共諸比丘入戒法中，不還戒、戒羸不出，行婬法乃至共畜生，是比丘得波羅夷罪，不應共事。

src_original: PrMoSū(Mā)_idaṃ bhagavatā veśālīyaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ pañcavarṣābhisaṃbuddhena  hemante pakṣe pañcame divase dvādaśame pūre bhuktamuttarāmukhaniṣaṇṇena dvyarddhapauruṣāyāṃcchāyāyāṃ  āyuṣmantaṃ yaśikakalandakaputramārabhya imasya ca śikṣāpadasya prajñaptirdharmo yathā  praṇihitasya ca yā anuvartanatā ayamucyate anudharmo /  PrMoSū(Mā)_Pār.2. yo punabhikṣū grāmādvā araṇyādvā adinnamanyātakaṃ stainyasaṃskāramādiyeya
tgt_original: 「若比丘，若聚落中、若空地，不與取，名盜物。

src_original: yathārūpeṇādinnādānena jāno gṛhītvā hanyemvā vadhemvā pravrājemvā hambho puruṣa corosi  bālosi mūḍhosi stainyosīti vā vadem tathārūpaṃ bhikṣūradinnamādeyamāno ayame bhikṣūḥ
tgt_original: 如不與物取故，若王、若王等，若捉、若殺、若縛、若擯，若輸金罪，若如是言： 汝小兒！

src_original: PrMoSū(Mā)_Pār.3. yo punabhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ manuṣyavigrahaṃ jīvitād vyāparopeya śastrahārakaṃ  cittasaṃkalpamanekaparyāyeṇa maraṇāya cainaṃ samādāpeya maraṇavaṇṇavāsya saṃvaṇṇeya
tgt_original: 「若比丘，若人、若似人，故自手奪命，若自持刀與、若教人持與，若教死、若讚死，若如是語：

src_original: sambahulāna gilānopasthāpakān bhikṣūnārabhya mṛgadaṇḍikaṃ ca parivrajakamimasya ca  śikṣāpadasya prajñaptirddharmo yathā praṇihitasya ca yā anuvarttanatā ayamucyate anudharmo /
tgt_original: 死勝生。 』隨彼心樂死、種種因緣教死讚死，是人因是事死，是比丘得波羅夷罪，不應共事。

src_original: ayaṃ pi bhikṣūḥ dharmmamalamāryajñānadaśanaṃ viśeṣādhiśeṣādhigama pratijāneya iti jānāmi iti paśyāmīti /
tgt_original: 「若比丘，空無所有，不知不見過人法聖利滿足，若知、若見作是語： 『我如是知、如是見。

src_original: vā a[sa] manugrāhiyamāṇo vā āpanno viśuddhiprokṣo evamavaci /
tgt_original: 』是比丘後時若問、若不問，為出罪求清淨故，作是言：

src_original: ayaṃ pi paśyāmīti iti tucchaṃ mṛṣāvilāpamanyatrābhimānāt /
tgt_original: 『我不知言知、不見言見。

tgt_original: 』空誑妄語，是比丘得波羅夷罪，不應共事；

src_original: uddiṣtāḥ // kho punarāyuṣmano catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmāḥ /  yeṣāṃ bhikṣuritonyatarāmāpattimāpadyetvā pārājiko bhavatyasamvāsyo na labhate hi bhikṣuhi sārddhasaṃvāsaṃ /  yathāpūrvve tathā paścādyathāpaścāttathā pūrvve pārājiko bhavatyasamvāsyo na labhate bhikṣu hi [sārdhaṃ] saṃvāsaṃ /
tgt_original: 已說四波羅夷法，若比丘犯一一法，是比丘不得共住，不得共事，如前後亦如是，是比丘得波羅夷罪，不應共事。

src_original: tatrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ /
tgt_original: 」「今問諸大德是中清淨不？

src_original: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāstṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ pariśuddhātrāyuṣmanto yasmāttūṣṇīmeva metaṃ dhārayāmi /  II. THE THIRTEEN SAMGHATISESA DHARMAS.
tgt_original: 」第二、第三亦如是問： 「是中清淨不？ 」「諸大德！ 是中清淨，默然故，是事如是持。

src_original: ime punarāyuṣmanto trayodaśa saṃghātiśeṣā dharmā anvaddharmāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddheśamāgacchanti /
tgt_original: 」「諸大德！ 是十三僧伽婆尸沙法，半月半月波羅提木叉中說。

src_original: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA.1. saṃcetanikā ye śukrasya viśṛṣtīye anyatra svapnāntareṃ saṃghātiśeṣo /  PrMoSū(Mā)_SA.2. yo punabhikṣu otīṇṇā vipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmeṇa sārddhaṃ kāyasaṃsaṃggaṃ
tgt_original: 「若比丘，故出精，是比丘僧伽婆尸沙； 除夢中。

src_original: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA.3. yo punabhikṣu otīṇṇā viparītena cittena mātṛgrāmaṃ dusthūlāya vācāya obhāṣeya pāpikāya maithunāya saṃvītāya saṃyathīdaṃ yuvāṃ yuvāṃ yuvatīti saṃghātiśeṣo /  PrMoSū(Mā)_SA.4. yo punabhikṣu otīṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmasya antike ātmikāye
tgt_original: 「若比丘，婬亂變心，與女人身共合，若捉手、若捉臂、若捉髮、若捉一一身分，若上若下摩，著細滑，僧伽婆尸沙。 「若比丘，婬亂變心，婬欲麁惡不善語，呼女人如年少男女相，僧伽婆尸沙。 「若比丘，婬亂變心，於女人前讚自供養己身語： 『姊妹！

src_original: kalyāṇadharmaṃ brahmacāriṃ etena dharmeṇa upasthiheya paricareya yaduta maithunopasaṃhiteneti saṃghātiśeṣo //
tgt_original: 如我等比丘，持戒、斷婬欲、行善法。 姊妹！ 婬欲法供養，是第一供養。 』僧伽婆尸沙。

src_original: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA.5. yo punabhikṣuḥ saṃcaritraṃ samāpadyeya striyāye vā puruṣasyopasaṃhareya  puruṣyasya vā sataṃ striyāye upasaṃhareya jāyattanena vā jārttanena vā antamasato
tgt_original: 「若比丘，行媒法，持男意至女邊、持女意至男邊，若為婦事、若私通事，乃至一交會時，僧伽婆尸沙。

src_original: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA.6. svayaṃ cāyikāya bhikṣuṇā kuṭī kārāpayamāṇena asvābhikātmoddeśikāṃ kuṭīkārāpayitavyā /
tgt_original: 「若比丘，無主為身自乞欲作房應量作，是房量：

src_original: tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ dīrdhaso dvādaśavitastīyo sugatavitastinā /  tiryaka saptāntaraṃ bhikṣu cānonābhinetavyā vastudeśanāya te hi bhikṣu hi vastu deśayitavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 長十二佛磔手、內廣七磔手，是比丘應將諸比丘，示作房處無難處、非妨處。
